about_the_game:
FantasyKingdom is an exciting hidden object puzzle game in a fantasy–medieval setting.
This game is a great way to relax after a hard day and get away from problems. Intuitive gameplay and a calm atmosphere does not bother the player and allows you to immediately immerse yourself in the process.
Melodious light music creates an atmosphere of tranquility and mystery in the game.
Some items will be easier to find. And some items will have to work hard to find! There are many items on the location, there are numerous trading tents, fortress walls, village houses and other medieval decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.

Melodious light music creates an atmosphere of tranquility and mystery in the game.
Some items will be easier to find. And some items will have to work hard to find! There are many items on the location, there are numerous trading tents, fortress walls, village houses and other medieval decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.
name: FantasyKingdom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: FantasyKingdom is an exciting hidden object 3D puzzle game in a fantasy–medieval setting. There are many items on the location, like numerous trading tents, fortress walls, village houses and other medieval decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.
